column1: # It seems that: ovcid = 3abcd, with abcd = HTM-haltenummer. The list below
# was actually verified to match the OVC records for only a few of the stations.
# Note that the city is filled in by hand, and may contain errors
# This record is not found on the website above, but was encountered in practice
# Additional info on many more lines seems to be available at http://www.htm.net/smartsite.dws?id=169
